home.title: Permissioned Social-Media Chain
home.description: A proof-of-concept chain for storing posts. Browse blocks, verify integrity, and inspect data.
home.install_browser_note: This demo currently works on Chrome, Edge, and Brave only.
home.step_enable_dev_mode: Open chrome://extensions and toggle 'Developer Mode' in the top-right.
home.step_go_to_extensions: Download the extension file using the button above.
home.step_drag_crx: Drag and drop the file into the extensions page.
home.note_other_browsers_desc: This demo only works on Chromium-based browsers. For other platforms, contact the developer.

blockchain.title: Blockchain Explorer
blockchain.description: A frontend connected to our permissioned-chain backend. Hover a block to reveal its data.
blockchain.connected: Data fetched live from the server at /chain

demo.instructions_step1: Make sure to install the Chrome extention
demo.instructions_step2: Scroll through tweets and quotes above.
demo.instructions_step3: Click 'Verify on Blockchain' to see proof.
demo.section_twitter_description: Click the button below to open my testing account on X and see the extension in action.
